label: Contact
comment: A person or department that acts as a point of contact with another person or department.

datatypeProperties.comment: The name, expressed as text, of the authorized person for this trade contact.
The code specifying the type of trade contact.
The name, expressed as text, of the department to which this trade contact belongs within an organization.
The unique identifier for this trade contact.
The job title, position or designation, expressed as text, of this trade contact within an organization, such as Director, Software Engineer, Purchasing Manager.
A unique identifier for this trade contact person.
The name, expressed as text, of this trade contact person.
A responsibility, expressed as text, of this trade contact.

objectProperties.comment: The direct telephone communication information for this trade contact.
The email URI communication information for this trade contact.
Fax communication information for this trade contact.
Instant messaging communication information for this trade contact.
The mobile telephone communication information for this trade contact.
A note specified for this trade contact.
The contact person specified for this trade contact.
Telephone communication information for this trade contact.
Telegraphy (Telex) communication information for this trade contact.
Voice Over Internet Protocol (VOIP) communication information for this trade contact.

referencedBy.comment: The person or department to be contacted in the event of any emergency related to these transported dangerous goods.
A reception facility contact for this transport waste material.
The expert to be contacted for details about the transport of these dangerous goods.
